column5: What does everyone think about adding a soluar calendar to the site?  I just realized that I'm forever looking one up online, and it's not adjusted for Ontario.... I dont know if they actually work or not, but they're fun to look at....  Rick...if you're not too busy...hehe.
I use the GPS timer for fishing and hunting all the time. It works great - the calender does a fine job also - I like it.  Bare
yeah that would be a great idea. I also look all over for it on the web, hard to find, i usually dont find any good ones, or any for ontario.
I also use my GPS,so far it is wrong.LOL
yes cliff i think it would be great,i look at mine on my GPS,but its still good to have one on the board as well,good idea
I go fishing when ever she lets me!
When the newer version of the software is up, we'll have a digest section in which I can put up a solunar chart or at the very least a moon phase diagram.
I like the idea. It is very hard to find one for the whole year.  Pam
